page.title: 08LEISURE.Flora and Fauna.
page.content:
ANIMALS and BIRDS.
Some common animals inhabiting the Country Park and it's surrounds are foxes,rabbits,voles,grey squirrels,weasels and stoats.There are some badger sets in the park but none of them are used however some do live in the neighbourhood and visit the park in their search for food.There are some adders in Trosley but they are so shy that it is very unlikely that they would do any harm to humans.Another common creature is the pipistrelle bat which can be seen at dusk flying along the glades and among the tree tops hunting for gnats,moths,and beetles.
